cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsui

sentence.romaji: minomawari no osewa ha watashi ga shimasu 。
sentence.english: I'll take care of things for you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minari

sentence.kanji: 身なりのいい人が入ってきた。
sentence.romaji: minari no ii hito ga haite kita
sentence.english: A well-dressed person came in.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougo

sentence.kanji: 男女交互に並んでください。
sentence.romaji: danjo kougo ni narande kudasai
sentence.english: Please make a line of boy girl boy girl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakusha

sentence.kanji: この本の作者は誰ですか。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no sakusha ha dare desu ka
sentence.english: Who is the author of this book?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hogosha

sentence.kanji: 私はこの子の保護者です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kono ko no hogosha desu
sentence.english: I'm this child's guardian.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinro

sentence.kanji: 卒業後の進路を迷っています。
sentence.romaji: sotsugyou go no shinro wo mayote imasu
sentence.english: I'm having trouble deciding what path I'll take after graduation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishin

sentence.kanji: 自分自身を疑ってはいけません。
sentence.romaji: jibun jishin wo utagate ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Don't doubt yourself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichijirushii

sentence.kanji: 彼の成長は著しいです。
sentence.romaji: kare no seichou ha ichijirushii desu
sentence.english: His progress is remarkable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arawasu

sentence.kanji: この本では自然の大切さがよく著されているよ。
sentence.romaji: kono hon de ha shizen no taisetsusa ga yoku arawasarete iru yo
sentence.english: The importance of nature is well written in this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chosha

sentence.kanji: この本の著者はイギリス人です。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no chosha ha igirisujin desu
sentence.english: The author of this book is British.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chosho

sentence.kanji: 彼の新しい著書が出版されたね。
sentence.romaji: kare no atarashii chosho ga shupan sareta ne
sentence.english: His new book was published.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikime

sentence.kanji: この薬の効き目は素晴らしいの。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri no kikime ha subarashii no
sentence.english: This medicine is so effective.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutei

sentence.kanji: 陸上部は校庭で練習しています。
sentence.romaji: rikujoubu ha koutei de renshuu shite imasu
sentence.english: A track club is practicing in the schoolyard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikan

sentence.kanji: 道で警官に呼び止められた。
sentence.romaji: michi de keikan ni yobitomerareta
sentence.english: I was stopped by a policeman on the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kosetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はスキーで足を骨折したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha suki- de ashi wo kosetsu shita no
sentence.english: She fractured her foot while skiing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katsuyaku

sentence.kanji: 彼の活躍で優勝したよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no katsuyaku de yuushou shita yo
sentence.english: His performance led us to win the tournament.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は私と再会の約束を交わした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi to saikai no yakusoku wo kawashita
sentence.english: He promised me that we'd meet again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuihou

sentence.kanji: 彼は国外に追放されました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kokugai ni tsuihou saremashita
sentence.english: He was deported.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unagasu

sentence.kanji: 彼に集中するよう注意を促しといたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ni shuuchuu suru you chuui wo unagashi toi ta yo
sentence.english: I urged him to concentrate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saisoku

sentence.kanji: 彼女に本を返すように催促したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni hon wo kaesu you ni saisoku shita no
sentence.english: I urged her to return the book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuukou

sentence.kanji: 私の免許は来年まで有効です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no menkyo ha rainen made yuukou desu
sentence.english: My license is effective until next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gishi

sentence.kanji: 彼はレントゲン技師です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha rentogen gishi desu
sentence.english: He is a radiographer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiwasu

sentence.kanji: 師走に入ると忙しくなります。
sentence.romaji: shiwasu ni hairu to isogashiku narimasu
sentence.english: I get very busy once December comes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karou

sentence.kanji: 彼は過労のために倒れたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha karou no tame ni taoreta no
sentence.english: He collapsed from overworking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sebamaru

sentence.kanji: ここから道の幅が狭まっています。
sentence.romaji: koko kara michi no haba ga sebamate imasu
sentence.english: The road narrows from here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sebameru

sentence.kanji: もっと範囲を狭めて探しましょう
sentence.romaji: moto hani wo sebamete sagashimashou
sentence.english: Let's narrow the range and search.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juujiro

sentence.kanji: 十字路で車とバイクが衝突したぞ。
sentence.romaji: juujiro de kuruma to baiku ga shoutotsu shita zo
sentence.english: The car collided with a motorcycle in the crossroads.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nameraka

sentence.kanji: この生地は滑らかな手触りが特長です。
sentence.romaji: kono kiji ha nameraka na tezawari ga tokuchou desu
sentence.english: This cloth's main feature is its smooth texture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kan

sentence.kanji: ガス管が爆発しました。
sentence.romaji: gasukan ga bakuhatsu shimashita
sentence.english: The gas pipe exploded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukemi

sentence.kanji: 彼はいつも受け身の姿勢で、自分からは何もしないんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha itsumo ukemi no shisei de jibun karaha nani mo shinai n da
sentence.english: He is always passive and never initiates anything himself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bukyou

sentence.kanji: お葬式は仏教で行うことが多いです。
sentence.romaji: osoushiki ha bukyou de okonau koto ga ooi desu
sentence.english: Funerals are often conducted according to Buddhist rites.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hisha

sentence.kanji: 筆者の趣旨を考えてください。
sentence.romaji: hisha no shushi wo kangaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please consider the author's point.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenshin

sentence.kanji: 運動した翌日は全身の筋肉が痛い。
sentence.romaji: undou shita yokujitsu ha zenshin no kinniku ga itai
sentence.english: I have muscular pain all over my body the day after I exercise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuukyou

sentence.kanji: 宗教を持たない人もたくさんいるわ。
sentence.romaji: shuukyou wo motanai hito mo takusan iru wa
sentence.english: There are also many people who have no religion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ou

sentence.kanji: 警官は怪しい男の後を追ったよ。
sentence.romaji: keikan ha ayashii otoko no ato wo ota yo
sentence.english: The police officer went after the suspicious man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's roujin

sentence.kanji: 子供が老人の手を引いて歩いていたの。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga roujin no te wo hiite aruite ita no
sentence.english: The child held the old person's hand as they walked.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niru

sentence.kanji: 今、豆を煮ています。
sentence.romaji: ima mame wo nite imasu
sentence.english: I'm boiling some beans now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nieru

sentence.kanji: もうすぐじゃがいもが煮えます。
sentence.romaji: mousugu jagaimo ga niemasu
sentence.english: The potato will be cooked soon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanchou

sentence.kanji: その古い建物は官庁です。
sentence.romaji: sono furui tatemono ha kanchou desu
sentence.english: That old building is the government office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyu

sentence.kanji: 花に露がついていました。
sentence.romaji: hana ni tsuyu ga tsuite imashita
sentence.english: There was some dew on the flower.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haneru

sentence.kanji: ウサギが雪の上を跳ねていったよ。
sentence.romaji: usagi ga yuki no ue wo hanete ita yo
sentence.english: The rabbit hopped through the snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dokusha

sentence.kanji: 新聞の読者の投書欄は好きです。
sentence.romaji: shinbun no dokusha no toushoran ha suki desu
sentence.english: I like the readers' letters column in the newspaper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaikyou

sentence.kanji: その海峡に橋が掛けられました。
sentence.romaji: sono kaikyou ni hashi ga kakeraremashita
sentence.english: A bridge was built across that strait.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousha

sentence.kanji: 古い校舎の修理が必要です。
sentence.romaji: furui kousha no shuuri ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: It is necessary to repair the old school building.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は新しい仕事に人生を賭けている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha atarashii shigoto ni jinsei wo kakete iru
sentence.english: He stakes his fortune on this new job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hasamu

sentence.kanji: ドアに指を挟んだ。
sentence.romaji: doa ni yubi wo hasanda
sentence.english: I trapped my finger in the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ashioto

sentence.kanji: 廊下から大きな足音が聞こえた。
sentence.romaji: rouka kara ooki na ashioto ga kikoeta
sentence.english: Loud footsteps were heard from the hallway.
